title: Fun Fur: Fall Fashion Trends 2014 | Lord & Taylor
description:
This season is all about fur. A touch of fur adds instant glamour, not to mention warmth, to practically any outfit. Whether real or faux, our only rule is to rock it.

http://www.lordandtaylor.com/webapp/wcs/stores/servlet/en/lord-and-taylor/search/whats-new--1/Contemporary-Trends-Fun-Fur
